landingBase.title: Hello and a very warm welcome!
landingBase.description: We are a customer focused team of developers committed to the highest quality of work and we stand behind our work.

aboutContainer.title: About Us
aboutContainer.description: We are a highly skilled and motivated team of designers and developers that will transform your ideas into working business solutions.
aboutContainer.text: Our team provides a range of services in software development and IT solutions. We take on large scale projects with complex requirements to applied solutions. Our approach is to use agile methodology.
aboutContainer.services: We are involved with projects in various professional fields as well as different specializations:

items.text: Creation of high-traffic web sites, web services, web applications and social networking products;
IT solutions for e-commerce, Internet stores;
Development and management of business applications for corporations;
Solutions for tourist, hotel and restaurant business;

talkContainer.title: Lets Talk About Your Disease
talkContainer.description: WE ARE READY TO WORK WITH YOU

items.text: ...Have no hesitation in dealing with you again and would recommend your service.

items.text: Well all I can say is “EPIC”! The car is incredible. My old 335d seems like something from another time.

items.text: Darren was fantastic and really helpful during my visit, and as usual, I was a pain with arrangements out if my control but he accommodated them perfectly and work around it, which was extremely grateful

expertsContainer.title: We Are Your Experts
expertsContainer.description: We utilize the latest technologies and have extensive experience in the following:

items.text: JavaScript, Node.js, Express.js, React, Redux, Webpack, Angular.js, Ruby, Ruby on Rails
MongoDB, SQLite, MySQL, HBase, Apache Spark, Cassandra
HTML5, CSS3, HAML, Jade, SaSS, PostCSS, Stylus, Gulp.js and D3.js
